name: BIG SHOTS
summary:
Welcome Aboard, Rookie
Gear up, team up, and exterminate! Become the ultimate mech pilot in BIG SHOTS, the action-packed VR roguelite where you’ll battle alien hordes, earn upgrades, and forge an unstoppable mech to reclaim Earth.

{"height":1402,"type":"image","width":1402}

An experiment gone wrong unleashed a relentless alien invasion, plunging humanity into chaos. Price Inc. initiated the BIG SHOTS Initiative to fight the invaders; this is where you come in, rookie. Become a Big Shot and take on the...
